content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Setup at position(0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
Two furnaces dedicated to smelting iron plates:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing

###Copper Smelting Setup at position(4.0, 4.0) and (6.0, 4.0)
Two furnaces dedicated to smelting copper plates:
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0) with coal fuel and copper ore processing
- Stone furnace at (6.0, 4.0) with coal fuel and copper ore processing

###Power Generation System at position(-2.5, 24.0)
Complete steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe network carrying water and steam between components
- Electrical pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft items requiring machine assembly
- Items like inserters, logistic science packs and their components cannot be hand-crafted
- Need to set up assembling machines to automate production of these items

### Errors when trying to insert items with empty inventory
- Check inventory has required items before attempting insertion operations
- Harvest more resources when running low on raw materials

### Errors when trying to extract from empty furnaces
- Verify furnace contains the item you're trying to extract before attempting extraction
- Wait for smelting to complete before attempting to extract plates

### Resource management errors
- Monitor coal levels in furnaces and boiler to maintain continuous operation
- Keep track of ore supplies and harvest more when running low
- Balance resource gathering between iron and copper based on needs
